SELECT ML.ML_ID,AD.AD_NAME AS ADNAME,ML.ML_TYPE,ML.ML_REMARK,ML.ML_MEMO, TO_CHAR(ML.ML_CREATE_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CTIME FROM T_MGRLOG ML LEFT JOIN T_ADMIN AD ON ML.ML_AD_ID= AD.AD_ID
AND ML.ML_CREATE_TIME >=TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{beginTime},' 00:00:00'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND ML.ML_CREATE_TIME <=TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{endTime},' 23:59:59'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND AD.AD_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{name}),'%')

SELECT COUNT(*) AS MYCOUNT FROM T_MGRLOG ML LEFT JOIN T_ADMIN AD ON ML.ML_AD_ID= AD.AD_ID
AND ML.ML_CREATE_TIME >=TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{beginTime},' 00:00:00'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND ML.ML_CREATE_TIME <=TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{endTime},' 23:59:59'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND AD.AD_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{name}),'%')
